translations: n．扩张主义者：主张国家领土、势力或影响范围扩张的人。
· The expansionists believed that their country should acquire more territories.
扩张主义者认为他们的国家应该获取更多的领土。

sentences.sentence: What the expansionists call the defects of the gold standard are indeed its very eminence and usefulness.
sentences.translation: 信贷扩张主义者认为的金本位的缺陷事实正是金本位的卓越和实用之处。

sentences.sentence: The innumerable base set up by the expansionists here and there in the world constitute a serious threat to peace.
sentences.translation: 扩张主义者在世界各地建立的无数基地是对和平的严重威胁。
